/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A few bare trees stand in the background, their branches reaching out to the clear blue sky above. 

A concrete overpass arches over the street, its curved shape adding a touch of modern architecture to the otherwise natural landscape. The overpass spans the width of the street, disappearing into the distance. 

On the right side of the street, a red sign stands out against the muted colors of the surroundings. The sign reads "No Parking" in both Chinese and English, a common sight in bustling cities around the world. 

The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the overpass and the clear blue sky, creating a sense of depth and perspective. The overall composition of the image suggests a peaceful day in a city where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
